column4: i think i might be having hardware issues, but im not sure, what would cause slow startups and even the BIOS menu to perform incredibly slowly?
nothing at all, i even unplugged the HDD
absolute bare bones and the problem persists
um... is there a way to make a memtest CD on a mac?
its my only current running machine
it is an option in the installer, or in grub
so, um... while running memtest86, "Pass" should probably be rising above 0% at some point, yeah?
the problem persists after i swap out the RAM. is it more likely that i have 2 sets of bad RAM, or that there's some other problem?
i think too, some bad ram, experiment wich one by using 2 at the time
